body_html: This is not related to the numerics themselves and the bug disappears for me when --num_concurrent_sessions=1 is passed in. The different sessions are apparently writing to the same memory locations. Stay tuned for a fix.
body_text: This is not related to the numerics themselves and the bug disappears for me when --num_concurrent_sessions=1 is passed in. The different sessions are apparently writing to the same memory locations. Stay tuned for a fix.
body: This is not related to the numerics themselves and the bug disappears for me when `--num_concurrent_sessions=1` is passed in. The different sessions are apparently writing to the same memory locations. Stay tuned for a fix.
